Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER is followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of the variant starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER among all rejection activities (including Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER, Declaration REJECTED by MISSING)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that eventually lead to a successful Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in variants that include Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that occur in declarations with Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER over Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that undergo re-submission (i.e., contain a subsequent Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in comparison to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of variants that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all variants ending in Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears in loops (i.e., multiple rejections in the same case)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that occur before any approval step by another role (e.g., ADMINISTRATION or BUDGET OWNER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Fraction of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that are not followed by any further activity (i.e., dead-end rejections)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Average number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER per case across all cases containing this activity
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that occur in domestic trip declarations (inferred from absence of pre-approval path in variants)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
